duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service in a remote call center environment for automotive dealerships nationwide.
Effectively communicate with customers, representing the dealership in a positive and professional manner.
Navigate and use multiple platform programs to guide phone conversations with customers while taking notes on relevant points for the dealership.
Communicate effectively using proper English and grammar in both one-on-one and team environments.
Maintain a quiet workspace free from background noise to ensure quality customer interactions.
